price: Wọ́n sì ń wo ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe fún àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
